item.title: Building a Data-Driven Project Reporting System: A Lens into Modern Data Engineering
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Picture yourself as a skilled carpenter who’s mastered building beautiful furniture, only to be asked to construct an entire house.

item.title: Why Micro Frontend
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Micro-Frontend - What & Why? As web applications become more complex and feature-rich, traditional frontend architectures such as monolithic will become harder to maintain, scale, and evolve.

item.title: Architecture Decision Record
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There is an issue that every team will inevitably bump into. Newbies might get confused when a project is being developed.

item.title: Fabric Hyperledger Architecture Explanation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Hyperledger Hyperledger is an open source community focused on developing a suite of stable frameworks, tools and libraries for enterprise-grade blockchain deployments.
